member.name: GameRecordController
member.summary: Controller for interacting with completed game records. Provides APIs for retrieving game records by ID and for retrieving all records.

member.name: GameRecordController.GetGameRecordById
member.summary: Returns the game record with the specified ID.
member.returns: Game record or NotFound if record not found.

member.name: GameRecordController.GetAllGameRecords
member.returns: List of game records or NotFound if no record was found.
